plot: Four high school students invent a new way to capture Green Energy. With help from their 4th grade science teacher, Barbara Morrow and a local engineer, John Gunn, they create a floor mat to harness energy with every footstep.
title: One Step at a Time
plot_es: Four high school students invent a new way to capture Green Energy. With help from their 4th grade science teacher, Barbara Morrow and a local engineer, John Gunn, they create a floor mat to harness energy with every footstep.
plot_en: Four high school students invent a new way to capture Green Energy. With help from their 4th grade science teacher, Barbara Morrow and a local engineer, John Gunn, they create a floor mat to harness energy with every footstep.
